item.title: Cloudflare's terraform provider authentication
item.description: This is a guide how to configure authentication for cloudflare’s terraform provider. One of my colleagues mentioned that it’s not exactly clear how to do that. This manual is describing experience with cloudflare’s enterprise account, for other types of cloudflare’s accounts your mileage may vary. Add cloudflare provider to your terraform state Just put a file providers.tf to your terraform state folder: provider "cloudflare" { version = "~> 1.15" } Version is optional - but I usually add it to avoid unexpected surprises.
